Reviews.Title: Longer recording time for GX7 video applications
Reviews.Author: Kit Laughlin ""Nikon FX shooter""
Reviews.Content: Significantly longer recording time than the original batteries. Inexpensive and appear to be well made. I was able to get 90 minutes of HD recording (AVCHD codec); this is all I need at the longest. The in-car charging plug will probably be very handy out in the field, too.

Reviews.Title: great set of batteries
Reviews.Author: Just the man
Reviews.Content: These batteries and charger are really great.  I bought these to supplement the battery that came with my Panasonic camera.  I believe that these batteries last longer than the brand-named battery and I am absolutely positive that the charger is better and faster.  It was well worth the purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great spare/replacement batteries at a good price.
Reviews.Author: G. Messick
Reviews.Content: These extra batteries are for my GX7 and they work great. The charger works well, and while I haven't used the car adapter, I like having the option.  I can't comment yet on how well it works though. The same or better life as the oem. I can shoot for days now.

Reviews.Title: The price is right
Reviews.Author: Tomboy
Reviews.Content: The main reason I purchased this kit was simply the price. At the time of my purchase, there were not many reviews so I figured I would give them a chance. The two batteries and charger were almost half the price of one Panasonic battery for my GX7.Though the mAH rating is higher than the OEM battery, I haven't really noticed a difference. Additionally, having an extra charger on hand is a plus. So far, I would by them again.

Reviews.Title: Works well so far
Reviews.Author: donpablo
Reviews.Content: Both batteries charged. I have tested them briefly in my Panasonic GX-7 camera and they seem to work as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Really good value
Reviews.Author: Richard Lin
Reviews.Content: What can I say?  These batteries are much cheaper than the original Panasonic battery for my GX7 and so far they seem to work just as well.  The included charger works great without issues.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Michael Good
Reviews.Content: Better than the OME battery and charger that came with my GX7 -- especially the charger. It is smaller and allows you to also charge from a car -- something the OME charger doesn't do. Great service, amazing price = I'll buy from these folks again.

Reviews.Title: Bought Two, Only One Works
Reviews.Author: M. Nothelfer "Fuzzy Normal"
Reviews.Content: As the title says.  One of the two batteries won't even turn on the camera.  The other one seems to hold a charge, just not as long as the OEM bat.  So there ya go, something to consider regarding this product.Anyway, they're cheap --and because I need all the juice I can get right now with my GX7 I'm not going to return the purchase, just chucking the bad bat into the trash.

Reviews.Title: Best choice!
Reviews.Author: Andrzej
Reviews.Content: Very good product I recommend it for 100% for everyone interested. Good choice, for a very reasonable price! Better than the original!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product, great price
Reviews.Author: Bufatutu
Reviews.Content: I needed new batteries for my new GX7. These seem to work perfectly, to last about as long as the original, and the charger is also a great addition as it has a car adapter, unlike the charger that came with the camera. So two batteries and a more versatile charger for less than the cost of one new OEM battery. Good deal!

Reviews.Title: Two Halcyon 1400 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery and Charger Kit
Reviews.Author: irisdolfin
Reviews.Content: I am a photographer, and I purchased this to have extra batteries handy for when I do weddings or events that will last more than a few hours with several hundred photos. When I got them they were each packaged nicely in their own separate boxes, along with a separate box for the charger.I went ahead and plugged them in because I wasn't sure how long they had been sitting since the last charge even though they said they came fully charged I just wanted to be sure. It didn't take long to charge to full battery since they came pretty much with a full charge.I used them on a new born shoot I did because I wanted to test out how long they would last.I was able to take about 250 pictures with them give or take some deleting and looking back through to make sure I got the shot I wanted. This battery lasted a couple hours with constant turning on and off of my camera.That's pretty good I guess, but the actual Lumix battery that came with my camera the Panasonic Lumix DMC-GX7 I am able to take over 400 pictures with one battery so I guess its about half of what the lumix battery can do.All and all for the price, and the fact that you get two batteries, plus the charger that converts to a car charger, makes it nice to have the extra ones when my Lumix battery runs out of juice. I can charge it while I have these in my camera. I would recommend these if you just need some extra batteries like I did.

Reviews.Title: So far so good in my GX7
Reviews.Author: S. Hoge
Reviews.Content: Bought this set for my GX7, so far so good.  I have not shot down an entire charge yet so can't comment on how much longer if any these will last than the stock Panasonic battery.  I can say that the product seems reliable and I think I will be carrying the Halcyon charger instead of the Panasonic, since the build quality looks good and it's dimensionally smaller than the Panny.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't hold charge in the cold
Reviews.Author: Kelli K Burkinshaw
Reviews.Content: I take longish kayak trips in SE Alaska (think cool and wet) and like to take lots of photos, videos and create timelapses too with my Panasonic GX7.  I was excited to see that these batteries were were rated for more mAH than the OEM batteries, so I bought a few of them.  On a recent four day paddle, I found that these batteries all lost their power after one night in ~30 degree F weather, whereas the OEMs I had both held their charges throughout the trip.  I'll be purchasing more OEMs...although these do work well in climate controlled settings - say longer video recordings inside the house. So it was not a total loss, just not the silver bullet I was hoping for on my longer kayak trips. Also, it was nice to get a charger that works on a DC input from my car.

Reviews.Title: Two Halcyon 1400 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery and Charger Kit for Panasonic Lumix GX7
Reviews.Author: W. Stein
Reviews.Content: I received  the two Halcyon 1400mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery and Charger Kit for my Lumix GX7  very quickly from vender. The charging  time of the two batteries was pretty short but could not evaluate the batteries any further since the camera they are supposed to power  is still wrapped und not available to me until Christmas.

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery & 1 Halcyon Brand Wall & Car Rapid Charger
Battery Specs: 1400 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Halcyon Support: Includes 5 Year Halcyon Replacement Warranty. Full Membership Access to Halcyon Customer Support Website
Frustration Free Packaging. No wasteful and dangerous plastic blister packs.
Compatible with all cameras which take Panasonic DMW-BLG10 Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Two Halcyon 1400 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery and Charger Kit for Panasonic Lumix DMC-GX7 Mirrorless Micro Four Thirds Digital Camera and Panasonic DMW-BLG10
